title.rendered: 4 Big Data Certifications to Launch Your Data Scientist Career

content.rendered:
[vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column column_width_percent=”80″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1486487468849{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_column_text]With data literacy becoming a crucial workforce skill and the industry’s need for enhanced data processing, security, and analysis, the demand for Data Scientists is higher than ever before. In fact, the demand for Data Scientists in the United States has increased by 650 percent since 2012, according to a recent LinkedIn report. With experts predicting that there will be 250,000 vacant Data Scientist roles by 2028, now is the time to identify and pursue big data certifications that will help launch your Data Science career.  [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”1″][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_speed=”500″ animation_delay=”100″]

Big Data Certifications

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_column_text]Each Data Scientist role will vary depending on the company, culture, and business needs. However, Tech talent looking to launch their careers in the data field will need to possess these in-demand big data certifications:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”90″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][uncode_list icon=”fa fa-lock2″ icon_color=”color-210407″]

  • Mining Massive Data Sets Graduate Certificate: This big data certification is a year-long course for Data Miners and analytics professionals looking to enhance their data processing strategies. Having this certification will show Tech companies that you have experience securely retrieving and storing data sets.
  • PGP in Big Data Analytics and Optimization: Formerly known as Certificate in Engineering Excellence Big Data Analytics and Optimization (CPEE), this big data certificate will help those with experience in programming languages like Hive, Python, Apache Spark, and Sqoop, apply those languages to machine learning data analysis.
  • Cornell Data Science Certification: Offered exclusively at Cornell University, this big data certification can help Data Scientists better understand how to use predictive data analysis as a marketing tool. With this certification, employers will see you as both a Technical and marketing asset.
  • Hortonworks Certified Associate (HCA): This certification is for the Data Scientists who are looking to improve their data engineering skills. A data course with an emphasis on programming languages, professionals with this certification will have the knowledge needed to process and build an analysis of large data sets.

[/uncode_list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”0″][vc_column_text]Each of these big data certifications will give you the tools needed to launch a successful career as a Data Scientist. They will provide you with the data-driven foundation that companies will see as a reason to offer you a competitive salary, in-demand benefits, and career mobility. If you are a Data Scientist with these in-demand certifications looking to find a challenging new role, contact Mondo today. Our experienced Tech recruiters can help you find your next Data Scientist role.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
